page.title: 14Tourist.
page.content: 1.Do you like the town of Aberystwyth? {Yes,because I lived here when I was a {child.}2.Why do you come to Aberystwyth for your holidays?{I come {to Aberystwyth because my friends live {here.}3.Do you like the beach?{No, {because it is too polluted.}4.Do you think there are enough gift shops in Aberystwyth?{No,there should be more {Welsh gift shops.}5.Would you recommend anyone to come to Aber?{Yes 6.Do you think there are enough Amusements here?{Yes.}7.Do you like the food here?{Yes I do}8.Do you think there should be a Wildlife park in Aber?{No,because there is not enough {room.}9.Do you think there should be a modern shopping centre here?{No.}10.Do you think Aberystwyth castle should be restored?{No I don't.}11.If you had the chance would you come here again? {Yes I would.
